Audio.Locality: Boa Nova, Wet Forest, state of Bahia
Audio.Author: Dan Lane
Audio.Comments: Mobbing vocalizations of several species surrounding a Glaucidium minutissimum in 12m canopy semihumid forest. The high 'tsee?' of the Tolmomyias is easy to pick out from the various vocalizations of other spp.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Thalurania glaucopis,Aphantochroa cirrochloris,Phaethornis eurynome,Coereba flaveola,Chiroxiphia caudata
